name: Rebel Artillery
Lore: 'The Rebel Alliance utilizes every piece of equipment, ammunition and personnel it can muster.',
Text: 'During your control phase, if you have a weapon (except a lightsaber, or [Permanent Weapon]) at a battleground you control, opponent loses one Force. OR If you just used a weapon (except a lightsaber, or [Permanent Weapon]) to hit a character or starship, opponent loses one Force. (Immune to Sense.)',
